data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sanborn, Allen F. (2017): Generic redescription, seven new species and a key to the Taphura Stål, 1862 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Cicadetttinae: Taphurini).
